name: @blueprint-agent/mcp-cli-agents
description: Agent-parameterized MCP servers for AI coding agents (Claude SDK, Gemini CLI, Codex CLI)

scripts.docker:test: docker run --rm -e ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -e OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY -e GOOGLE_API_KEY=$GOOGLE_API_KEY mcp-cli-agents-test
scripts.docker:test:integration: docker run --rm -e ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -e OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY -e GOOGLE_API_KEY=$GOOGLE_API_KEY mcp-cli-agents-test vitest run tests/integration.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.docker:test:detailed: docker run --rm -e ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -e OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY -e GOOGLE_API_KEY=$GOOGLE_API_KEY -e NODE_ENV=test mcp-cli-agents-test vitest run tests/integration.test.ts --reporter=verbose
scripts.docker:shell: docker run --rm -it -e ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -e OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY -e GOOGLE_API_KEY=$GOOGLE_API_KEY mcp-cli-agents-test bash
